categories: Category:Star Wars Jedi Quest Kids Club Magazine

nodes.text: Star Wars Jedi Quest Kids Club Magazine

Star Wars Jedi Quest Kids Club Magazine was a children's magazine series published by Hasbro Inc. from April to November 2000. As part of Hasbro's Star Wars Jedi Quest Kids Club, it was designed to promote new Star Wars toys to young readers. The magazine lasted for three issues.

With the release of the premiere issue, the magazine was originally titled Star Wars Jedi Quest CommLink and billed itself as "the official newsletter for club members," in regards to the Jedi Quest Kids Club. The magazine was renamed to Jedi Quest Kids Club Magazine for its final two issues.
